Text: ["So that's how our little Commandant spends their days. Truly setting a stellar example, aren't you?", "Let's call demolition and fry the whole place. That'll spice things up.", "All this stuff every single day... I'm seriously getting fed up with that.", 'Be sure to rest while you can. I expect you to be sharp as a tack when duty calls.']
['Let me show you my dazzling <color=#f58220>Unstoppable Might</color>!']
['Let me show you my dazzling <color=#f58220>Unstoppable Might</color>!']
['Let me see, which little cutie came to play?']
["I've got backup this time. No way you're getting away with this!"]
["Don't blame us for picking on you!"]
